# add

Add license to Coder deployment

## Usage

```console
add [-f file | -l license]
```

## Options

### --file, -f

|     |     |
| --- | --- |

Load license from file

### --license, -l

|     |     |
| --- | --- |

License string

### --debug

|     |     |
| --- | --- |

Output license claims for debugging
